languages.text: {n}Муаран взирает на вас несколько мгновений. Наконец, он изрекает.{/n} "Союз? Так ты воспринял{mf||а} мои слова? Впрочем, если это слово нравится тебе больше, пусть будет союз".

traits.locale_text: {n}Муаран взирает на вас несколько мгновений. Наконец, он изрекает.{/n} "Союз? Так ты воспринял мои слова? Впрочем, если это слово нравится тебе больше, пусть будет союз".

languages.text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."
languages.original_text: {n}Муаран взирает на вас несколько мгновений. Наконец, он изрекает.{/n} "Союз? Так ты воспринял{mf||а} мои слова? Впрочем, если это слово нравится тебе больше, пусть будет союз".

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."
{n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."
{n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."
{n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

languages.text: {n}穆兰盯着你看了几秒钟，最后终于开了口。{/n}“同盟？你就是这样理解我说的话吗？不过话说回来，如果你喜欢这个词的话，我们就称之为同盟吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰盯着你看了几秒钟，最后终于开了口。{/n}“同盟？你就是这样理解我说的话吗？不过话说回来，如果你喜欢这个词的话，我们就称之为同盟吧。”

languages.text: {n}ムアランはこちらを数秒間見つめていた。しばらくして、彼は言葉を発した。{/n}「同盟だと？それが私の言葉を解釈した結果か？なるほど、お前がその言葉を好むなら、我らもそれを同盟と言おうではないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

traits.locale_text: {n}ムアランはこちらを数秒間見つめていた。しばらくして、彼は言葉を発した。{/n}「同盟だと？それが私の言葉を解釈した結果か？なるほど、お前がその言葉を好むなら、我らもそれを同盟と言おうではないか」

languages.text: {n}Muaran starrt dich einige Sekunden lang an. Schließlich sagt er:{/n} "Eine Allianz? Deutet Ihr so meine Worte? Na gut, wenn Euch das Wort lieber ist, nennen wir es eine Allianz."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran starrt dich einige Sekunden lang an. Schließlich sagt er:{/n} "Eine Allianz? Deutet Ihr so meine Worte? Na gut, wenn Euch das Wort lieber ist, nennen wir es eine Allianz."

languages.text: {n}Muaran vous dévisage un long moment, puis il finit par dire :{/n} « Une alliance ? Est-ce ainsi que vous avez interprété mes paroles ? Soit, si vous préférez ce terme, nous appellerons cela une alliance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran vous dévisage un long moment, puis il finit par dire :{/n} « Une alliance ? Est-ce ainsi que vous avez interprété mes paroles ? Soit, si vous préférez ce terme, nous appellerons cela une alliance. »

languages.text: {n}Muaran te mira fijamente durante varios segundos. Finalmente, dice:{/n} «¿Una alianza? ¿Así es como has interpretado mis palabras? Pero de acuerdo, si prefieres ese término, lo llamaremos alianza».
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran te mira fijamente durante varios segundos. Finalmente, dice:{/n} «¿Una alianza? ¿Así es como has interpretado mis palabras? Pero de acuerdo, si prefieres ese término, lo llamaremos alianza».

languages.text: {n}Muaran birkaç saniye sana dik dik bakıyor, sonra da söze başlıyor.{/n} "İttifak mı? Dediklerimden bunu mu anladın? Madem böyle denmesini tercih ediyorsun, o hâlde adı ittifak olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran stares at you for several seconds. At last, he says,{/n} "An alliance? That is how you interpreted what I said? Then again, if you prefer that word, let us call it an alliance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran birkaç saniye sana dik dik bakıyor, sonra da söze başlıyor.{/n} "İttifak mı? Dediklerimden bunu mu anladın? Madem böyle denmesini tercih ediyorsun, o hâlde adı ittifak olsun."
